fields.name: Fields
fields.body: Scored at END OF GAME. Points based on total number of plowed fields (empty or sown): 0-1 fields = -1 VP, 2 fields = 1 VP, 3 fields = 2 VP, 4 fields = 3 VP, 5+ fields = 4 VP.
fields.details: Fields are created by the Plow action. Once plowed, a field remains even after harvesting. Fields can be sown with Grain or Vegetables.
fields.extra: Scored: End of game | Max: 4 VP

pastures.name: Pastures
pastures.body: Scored at END OF GAME. Points based on total number of fenced pastures (enclosed areas, not individual spaces): 0 pastures = -1 VP, 1 pasture = 1 VP, 2 pastures = 2 VP, 3 pastures = 3 VP, 4+ pastures = 4 VP.
pastures.details: A pasture is a fully fenced area that can span multiple farmyard spaces. Each pasture counts as one regardless of how many spaces it covers.
pastures.extra: Scored: End of game | Max: 4 VP

grain.name: Grain
grain.body: Scored at END OF GAME. Count all Grain in personal supply and on fields: 0 Grain = -1 VP, 1-3 Grain = 1 VP, 4-5 Grain = 2 VP, 6-7 Grain = 3 VP, 8+ Grain = 4 VP.
grain.details: Grain in personal supply and Grain tokens on sown fields both count toward the total.
grain.extra: Scored: End of game | Max: 4 VP

vegetables.name: Vegetables
vegetables.body: Scored at END OF GAME. Count all Vegetables in personal supply and on fields: 0 Vegetables = -1 VP, 1 Vegetable = 1 VP, 2 Vegetables = 2 VP, 3 Vegetables = 3 VP, 4+ Vegetables = 4 VP.
vegetables.details: Vegetables in personal supply and Vegetable tokens on sown fields both count toward the total.
vegetables.extra: Scored: End of game | Max: 4 VP

sheep.name: Sheep
sheep.body: Scored at END OF GAME. Count all Sheep on your farmyard: 0 Sheep = -1 VP, 1-3 Sheep = 1 VP, 4-5 Sheep = 2 VP, 6-7 Sheep = 3 VP, 8+ Sheep = 4 VP.
sheep.details: Sheep are white cubes. They must be housed in fenced pastures, unfenced stables, or as a single pet in your home.
sheep.extra: Scored: End of game | Max: 4 VP

wild_boar.name: Wild Boar
wild_boar.body: Scored at END OF GAME. Count all Wild boar on your farmyard: 0 Wild boar = -1 VP, 1-2 Wild boar = 1 VP, 3-4 Wild boar = 2 VP, 5-6 Wild boar = 3 VP, 7+ Wild boar = 4 VP.
wild_boar.details: Wild boar are black cubes. They must be housed in fenced pastures, unfenced stables, or as a single pet in your home.
wild_boar.extra: Scored: End of game | Max: 4 VP

cattle.name: Cattle
cattle.body: Scored at END OF GAME. Count all Cattle on your farmyard: 0 Cattle = -1 VP, 1 Cattle = 1 VP, 2-3 Cattle = 2 VP, 4-5 Cattle = 3 VP, 6+ Cattle = 4 VP.
cattle.details: Cattle are brown cubes. They must be housed in fenced pastures, unfenced stables, or as a single pet in your home.
cattle.extra: Scored: End of game | Max: 4 VP

unused_spaces.name: Unused Farmyard Spaces
unused_spaces.body: Scored at END OF GAME. Lose 1 VP for each unused farmyard space. Unused spaces are empty spaces without rooms, fields, stables, or fencing.
unused_spaces.details: Your farmyard has 15 spaces (3 rows × 5 columns). Spaces occupied by rooms, fields, or stables are not unused. Fenced empty spaces within pastures are also not unused.
unused_spaces.extra: Scored: End of game | Penalty only

fenced_stables.name: Fenced Stables
fenced_stables.body: Scored at END OF GAME. Each stable that is inside a fenced pasture scores 1 VP. Unfenced stables score no points.
fenced_stables.details: Stables inside pastures double the animal capacity of the entire pasture. Only stables within fenced areas score points.
fenced_stables.extra: Scored: End of game | Bonus only

rooms.name: Rooms
rooms.body: Scored at END OF GAME. Wooden hut rooms score 0 VP each. Clay hut rooms score 1 VP each. Stone house rooms score 2 VP each.
rooms.details: Players start with 2 Wooden hut rooms. Rooms can be renovated from Wood to Clay to Stone. Additional rooms can be built before renovating.

family_members.name: Family Members
family_members.body: Scored at END OF GAME. Each Family member scores 3 VP. Players start with 2 and can grow to a maximum of 5.
family_members.details: Family members are added through Family Growth actions. Each requires a room (except through the special action). Maximum 5 Family members.
family_members.extra: Scored: End of game | 6-15 VP range

cards.name: Improvement & Occupation Cards
cards.body: Scored at END OF GAME. Score the point value shown in the yellow circle on each played Occupation and Improvement card. Some cards also provide Bonus points as described in their text.
cards.details: Points come from both Major and Minor Improvements, as well as Occupation cards. Only played cards count - cards still in hand score nothing.

begging_cards.name: Begging Cards
begging_cards.body: Scored at END OF GAME. Lose 3 VP for each Begging card held. Begging cards are taken when you cannot feed your Family members during a Harvest.
begging_cards.details: During each Harvest, you must provide 2 Food per Family member. For each Food you cannot provide, you take 1 Begging card. Begging cards cannot be removed.
begging_cards.extra: Scored: End of game | Penalty only
